institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-Specific Human Resources Development Committee (ISC) Operating Rules/Article 6-2 (Minutes of Deliberation Committee Meetings)
contents: Article 6-2 (Minutes of Deliberation Committee Meetings) ① Minutes of meetings shall be prepared including the following matters. Newly established on December 31, 2019, 1. Name of the meeting, 2. Date and location, 3. List of attendees and attendees, 4. Order of proceedings and agenda items, 5. Summary of remarks and decisions (voting results), ② No. 1 Meeting minutes prepared pursuant to paragraph shall be stored through the electronic record production system after receiving the confirmation signatures of the attending members, including the chairperson., ③ The committee shall disclose the meeting minutes or meeting results through the Corporation's website, etc. within 14 days. However, in any of the following cases, part or all of the minutes may not be disclosed by specifying the reason with the approval of more than two-thirds of the attending members. 1. It is recognized that it will significantly impede the fair performance of business. 2. When it is recognized that there is a risk of harming the legitimate interests of a corporation, organization, or individual; 3. When it is recognized that there is a risk of social repercussions if disclosed.
